channel.title: [317] Pr0digyscape [317] UPDATED GOALS(BOTTEM)
channel.description:
//First 317 server\\ Base= Delta! :), and then based off pkjadscape (thx i give tons of creds to u for quests :)) Customs:
All customs work 100% Dplate= exact rs copy dclaws working spec all custom weapons(mayb 70% i mean) have specs, like statius vesta dual sgs ss etc
Pvp drop system- YEE took for ever to get this right, made one small mistake which madee it hard basic set up, when player kill player, the player will drop 20 items of those 20 15 are always food, manta, shark or lobs the other 5 r either 1 pvp drop(RARE) or food 1 Barrows item(lil less rare than pvp) or food and the other 3 r basic item, rune pl8, obby cape, addy pl8, rings, ammys etc or food
this is all based off rs pvp drop system, currently working on getting a uhhh player value system added so people cant spam kill for money(fixed that by making drops very rare, and preventing multi log ins, and added a sM so if a admin or owner is on, they can see if a player is dieing consistantly, he can check it out)
current bosses added- saradomin Custom (custom boss, not actual rs sara) zammy boss real rs bandos real bandos + mini bosses arma real rs arma, + mini bosses corp beast + rev drag in king dag area(very open easy access) summonboss(steeltitan+geyser titan + pickupstixx npc) drops more charms and stuff more common kbd kq titan training dragon training
PICTURES! :)
[IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17164451.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17164440.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17164459.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17164513.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17164657.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17164715.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17164726.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17164832.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17164850.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17164913.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17164950.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17165031.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17165115.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17165146.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17165217.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17165249.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17165313.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17165532.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17165825.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17170245.png[/img]
OK and finally credits i guess: google-%10 pkjadscape - %25 mopar models- %25(for inspiration to work with all the epic models[rs models]) uh, friends, ruben, puneet %10 me 30% for all coding that was added(maybe less idk, and idc rlly)
oooo yee forgot_
thanks a TON to pkjadscape for their pk point system that was somewhat hard to find, but was there, i editted it a bit, and now because of your base, i got fully working pvp points and buyable pvp items! :)
will post vids shortly.
tell meh if there is any advertising
second note: hadly any lagg :)
EDITS= forgot to mention trainable skills cb stats firemaking woodcut mining fletching summoning theiving working on herb cbb to make codes :)
also new max cb - 138 if 99 summon :)
MORE PICS! :)
[IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17164340.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17161324.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17161602.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17161651.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17161732.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-06-17161627.png[/img]
NOW , for future updates! :)
- Make Corp hit multi targets like rs - add playervalue to pvp drops - add more summon pouches to help increase summon exp, currently 5 are makeable and 6 are summonable
MORE UPDATES
Creating a new world Client Editting to make it look like god wars (snowy) start - edge bank purpose - get to mage bank where the gw bosses are. start off with full iron, kill a npc (to be chosen) to upgrade armour and stats i plan on making exp rate take about a week to get all cb 99s only stats that will be used - pray att str def hp range mage. players will have to get basic equipment from monsters, but when they reach the wildy, its open game for pkers. there are better dropping monsters in the wildy part, higher lvl the further u go in. and onceyou reach the gate to get to the lvl 50+ wildy, you must have atleast 2 99s to avoid people spamming inside gw. once inside the 4 bosses along with 8 generals will roam, you and or a clan must kill them to get good loot, the more boss kills u get, the more boss points u get
points in here will be simple- pk points, each kill = 2 points boss points, each kill = 1 point
pk exchange shop will have many decent pk items, such as d claws
boss points will have a variety of gw items, like bandos chest, and many custom gw items, like bandos full helm.
npcs will drop, steel, addy, then wildy ones drop rune, higher wildy, drop dragon, and bosses /generals drop barrows / gw items(RARE). and im going to incorperate jad into this by adding a tele from home to the wilderness lava maze and have jad in the middle, kill him for cape.
pk drops will be rs randomized drops ( e.g sharks, addy, steel, 1 rune item, plus the cahnce of something good).

item.title: [317] Pr0digyscape [317] UPDATED GOALS(BOTTEM)
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

I like your source, but a couple of things you could do to make it better is;

  1. Change the Inven background, it’s hard to see some of the models
  2. Don’t have SO many customs, you wont be able to get a economy.
  3. Where the green drags are, threes three of them all trying to have a gang bang… Come on, spread them out a bit!
  4. Like everyone else said, the GameFrame is horrid, the only bit i like about it is the buttons around the bottem, but around the inven background, atleast try and make some GUI features, like an actual box around the icons.

What i like

  1. I lOVE the starting area, it’s amazing, ive never even seen that in RuneScape!! Very original, keep it up
  2. Teleport place is awesome, not just the same small sand-colour portals all in one big line, nice work!
  3. I like where the shops are located, not one MASSIVE room filled to the brim with endless, pointless shops, so nice work

I would give you a 7/10, to improve i would recommend showing a vid, or some actual pics of you going, say firemaking but half way through

thanks
~Johno

Read full topic

yep, im 14 and avg 92 in school, im dumb fucked, and im 7, yeepp, its the damn internet ffs? do u think ppl talk normal on here 24/7!? omgwtfbbq, write that on an exam and tell ur teacher thats proper english.

@topic-[quote=“zyle1992, post:34, topic:284088”]Your Bosses need some animation. I saw that the Armadyl boss has it’s wings outstretched, but in a stationary position. And try a different game frame. The current one has no concrete theme. It’s busy, and dark. A game frame should be visually appealing, and do it’s job efficiently. The theme you have now to me would be more sorted for a signature. Other than that, looks pretty good.[/quote]

yeh im looking for someone to animate npcs for me as i honestly can’t figure out how to get it working clean, most 508+ npcs, like corporal beast arn’t animated, and im updating gameframe to the origanal, getting pictures later, im trying to figure out npc’s hitting multiple targets still D:

Your Bosses need some animation. I saw that the Armadyl boss has it’s wings outstretched, but in a stationary position. And try a different game frame. The current one has no concrete theme.
